item.description: Colombia was a top U.S. ally in Latin America until the Trump administration began deadly strikes in international waters. Now, one family wants justi...

item.title: BBC Apologizes to Trump Over Film Edit but Declines to Pay Compensation
item.description: The BBC said it would not rebroadcast a misleadingly edited documentary but added, “We strongly disagree there is a basis for a defamation claim.”

item.title: Of Books and Men
item.description: My colleague, the book critic Dwight Garner, tells us about “Flesh” by David Szalay, this year’s Booker Prize winner.
